title: Will Islam collapse with technologies such as smartphones and computers? - Quora

response.answer_text: Seemingly not. Many muslim societies have smartphones and computers. Both things are information transporters, and there’s nothing hindering seeing someone preach as a live stream. Also, in areas with poor infrastructure, the wireless technology of smartphones bring information from the world to more remote areas. If anything, religions thrive with the emergence of technologies.

That is what we have to hope The more people who study any religion in depth the more people realise the essentially man made nature of all the so called divine religions The more people who see how the rest of the world lives and how poor and repressed their own little lives are the sooner they will revolt against the man made shackles of man made religions
